meanings.sent1: I stayed home cuz it was raining outside.
meanings.sent2: I like ice cream cuz it's sweet and cold.
meanings.sent3: I couldn't go to the party cuz my dog ate my shoes!
meanings.sent4: She smiled cuz she knew she had done a good job.
meanings.sent5: He ran fast cuz he wanted to win the race.

meanings.sent1: My cuz is coming over for dinner tonight.
meanings.sent2: I have a lot of fun playing with my cuz at family gatherings.
meanings.sent3: My cuz and I always end up laughing at silly jokes.
meanings.sent4: I see my cuz every summer when we visit our grandparents.
meanings.sent5: My cuz is like a sibling to me, always there for me.
